refnamediv.refpurpose: multiply columns of data by a given factor
add a given value to columns of data

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Mult_chan will multiply all numbers in the specified columns by the given factor. The infile is an ASCII file, with columns separated by white space. The columns are numbered from 0 to (n-1). Add_chan behaves analogously, but with addition rather than multiplication.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.para: These routines are useful for converting between units in animation tables.
